title: Intensive Online Simulation-Based Language Proficiency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Understanding of Job-Related Technical Terminology
context.additional_context: Practical language simulations in VR environments replicating global business scenarios

learning_goals: Learners complete three or more work scenarios in VR simulations using specialized language proficiency.
Learners derive optimal decisions in over 80% of virtual negotiation situations by applying critical thinking.
Learners execute 90% of collaboration strategies with multicultural peers to achieve project goals in VR team projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
